thread.title: This was the worse hotel I have ever been in
thread.title_full: This was the worse hotel I have ever been in - Review of Days Inn Hotel New York City-Broadway, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Sherlan T
title: This was the worse hotel I have ever been in
text:
This was clearly a hotel being used as a welfare boarding hotel. The room was smoky and filthy. The hallway was boarded up. The rooms did not look close to what was being advertised.
False advertising, be truthful tom people who are looking for some place economical but nice
